title: Blueberry and Lemon Scones
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsalted butter, cut into small pieces
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Cut the unsalted butter into small pieces and add to the bowl, using your fingers to rub the butter

title: Quinoa and Black Bean Salad
ingredients: 1 can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 cup cherry tomatoes, sliced in half
instructions: Cook the quinoa according to package instructions.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, black beans, cherry tomatoes, red onion, and cilantro.
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.

title: Spicy Shrimp and Mango Skewers
ingredients: 2 mangoes, peeled and cut into bite-sized pieces
1 red bell pepper, seeded and cut into bite-sized pieces
1 red onion, cut into bite-sized pieces
instructions: Soak wooden skewers in water for 30 minutes.
Thread the shrimp, mango, red bell pepper, and red onion onto the skewers.
In a bowl, whisk together minced garlic, grated ginger, soy sauce, honey, Sriracha sauce, lime juice, salt, and pepper.
Brush the marinade onto the skewers.
Grill for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until the shrimp is cooked through.

title: Avocado and Grapefruit Salad
instructions: Slice the avocado and grapefruit into wedges.
Arrange the mixed greens on a plate.
Top with the avocado, grapefruit, and sliced red onion.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

title: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F.
Mix breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a shallow dish.
Whisk the eggs in another shallow dish.
Dip each chicken breast in the egg mixture, then coat with the breadcrumb mixture.
Place the chicken in a baking dish and top with marinara sauce and shredded mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Sprinkle with chopped fresh basil before serving.

title: Grilled Ribeye Steak
instructions: Preheat the grill to high heat.
Brush both sides of the ribeye steaks with olive oil.
In a small bowl, mix together garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper.
Season both sides of the steaks with the spice mixture.
Grill the steaks for 5-6 minutes per side, or until they reach your desired level of doneness.
Let the steaks rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

title: Cauliflower Fried Rice
instructions: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add the onion and garlic and cook until the onion is translucent.
Add the frozen peas and carrots and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
Push the vegetables to one side of the skillet and add the eggs to the other side. Scramble the eggs and then mix everything together.
Add the grated cauliflower, soy sauce, sesame oil, salt, and pepper.
Cook for 5-7 minutes or until the cauliflower is tender.
Serve hot.

name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: These cookies are a classic and always a crowd-pleaser. They are soft and chewy with just the right amount of chocolate chips in every bite.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: This classic Italian dish is creamy and flavorful, with tender chicken and perfectly cooked pasta. It's a comforting meal that's sure to please the whole family.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: This colorful and healthy stir fry is loaded with fresh vegetables and flavorful sauce. It's quick and easy to make, and perfect for a busy weeknight dinner.
